title: Shingles | Varicella zoster vaccine - Health Service | Accès pharma
description: Shingles: a reactivation of the virus that causes chicken pox, often in people as young as 50, is characterized by a skin rash that can be horribly painful. A vaccine does, however, exist.
cleaned_text: dry skin; most of us will experience a problem with our skin at one time or another.
